Jeff Noh / Mention

Jot

2014-2015
ios

Jot was an iOS and web app for hosting spontaneous chats with friends. The app was designed around immediacy and sponteneity – ideas that emerged from iterating on its predecessor Mention.

I concepted, designed and built Jot while at Caret Labs.

Core Concepts

  • Ephemerality: limited history to encourage Jotters to be spontaneous
  • Immediacy: push model encouraged conversations to happen as quickly as possible
  • Presence: features were designed to show who else was in the thread and around the app

Outcomes

  • Jot held a vibrant community who rallied around open thought and meaningful conversations
  • Secured venture capital investment
  • Learned that there was a hunger for presence and synchronous communication, which became a focus of Caret Labs
